detectors.description:
EtherLotto.play() (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#24-44) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- bank.transfer(FEE_AMOUNT) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#36)
detectors.markdown:
[EtherLotto.play()](samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#L24-L44) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- [bank.transfer(FEE_AMOUNT)](samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#L36)

detectors.description: EtherLotto.play() (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#24-44) uses a weak PRNG: "random = uint256(sha3()(block.timestamp)) % 2 (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#31)"

EtherLotto.play() (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#24-44) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- random == 0 (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#34)

EtherLotto.play() (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#24-44) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- random == 0 (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#34)
detectors.markdown:
[EtherLotto.play()](samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#L24-L44) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [random == 0](samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#L34)

detectors.description:
Deprecated standard detected random = uint256(sha3()(block.timestamp)) % 2 (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#31):
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
detectors.markdown:
Deprecated standard detected [random = uint256(sha3()(block.timestamp)) % 2](samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#L31):
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

detectors.description:
Version constraint ^0.4.15 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder
	- ZeroFunctionSelector.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.15 (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#2)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in EtherLotto.play() (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#24-44):
	External calls:
	- bank.transfer(FEE_AMOUNT) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#36)
	- msg.sender.transfer(pot - FEE_AMOUNT) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#39)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pot = 0 (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#42)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [EtherLotto.play()](samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#L24-L44):
	External calls:
	- [bank.transfer(FEE_AMOUNT)](samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#L36)
	- [msg.sender.transfer(pot - FEE_AMOUNT)](samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#L39)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [pot = 0](samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_071.sol#L42)
